content.text: Hi there, how is your day going?
Good. I 'm watching football on TV. What about you?
I like to watch action movies with my family on Netflix on weekends.
That sounds fun. Do you have any kids?
No, I do not have any kids. I have a harsh inner critic.
What do you mean by that?
I mean that I am always judging myself and think I am not good enough.
Oh, I do not do that. I am pretty confident in myself.
That is good. I wish I was more confident.
Maybe you should try some self-affirmations.
They are positive statements that you say to yourself to boost your self-confidence.
I will try that. Thanks for the tip.
No problem. Glad I could help.
